dc_title_s: The cantonments, civil station and environs of Cawnpoor : 1852-3-4
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:7,290]. 10 chains or 660 ft. = 1 in. 8 in. = 1 mi. Includes notes, area statement, and signature of deputy surveyor general of India. North oriented to the upper left."On transfer paper by Munneerodeen, Mahomed Azeem & Sobhan Buksha."|62 x 165 centimeters, folded to 34 x 22 centimeters|Scale [1:7,290]; 10 chains or 660 feet = 1 inch 8 inch = 1 miles|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
